WorkItem.Description:
Something changed recently (over the last month or so) or with the t13 bosses... to make Prot Pally Mastery enormously vauled.
yes, Mastery Rating is good, but it is not as this good : Stat values - Relitive stat values on attached file.
Â 
this is causeing issues with ignoreing Gem Socket bounus no mater how good.  and changeing the Meta to the Mastery meta.  - and favoring Mastery gear, not matter what.

Comments.Message: I did some checking, and after reading the 4.3 prt EJ notes, it would seem that Mastery is of higher value up to block cap, it should not be as high After block cap (102.4)  perhaps the calulation is not takeing the block cap into account?  - just a guess.
